mapper.insert: INSERT INTO alarm_config(id,clusterType,clusterName, alarmType, alarmRule, threshold,receiver,mailMode,smsMode,weixinMode,toBusiness,createTime, updateTime) VALUES(#{id}, #{clusterType},#{clusterName}, #{alarmType}, #{alarmRule},#{threshold},#{receiver},#{mailMode},#{smsMode},#{weixinMode},#{toBusiness},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.select: SELECT id,clusterType,clusterName, alarmType, alarmRule, threshold,receiver,mailMode,smsMode,weixinMode,toBusiness,createTime, updateTime FROM alarm_config WHERE clusterType= #{clusterType} AND clusterName=#{clusterName} ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id,clusterType,clusterName, alarmType, alarmRule, threshold,receiver,mailMode,smsMode,weixinMode,toBusiness,createTime, updateTime FROM alarm_config WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT id,clusterType,clusterName, alarmType, alarmRule, threshold,receiver,mailMode,smsMode,weixinMode,toBusiness,createTime, updateTime FROM alarm_config ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
